task.title: SDK simplification and dashboard migration to SDK

events.content: Lazy-load daemon in SDK standalone: Lazy-load daemon in SDK standalone

raw.question: Lazy-load daemon in SDK standalone
raw.reasoning: Keeps SDK lightweight for client-only users

events.content: Migrate dashboard to SDK instead of wrapper: Migrate dashboard to SDK instead of wrapper

raw.question: Migrate dashboard to SDK instead of wrapper
raw.chosen: Migrate dashboard to SDK instead of wrapper

events.content: Use TDD for migration: Use TDD for migration

raw.question: Use TDD for migration
raw.reasoning: Created compatibility tests before changing imports

retrospective.summary: Added createRelay/createPair for dead-simple communication, added MCP createTools for programmatic use, migrated dashboard from wrapper to SDK with full test coverage
